title: Sales Cold Caller B2B
job_overview:
At Upgrade to see actual info/ we provide a lead generation service, while focusing on appointment setting via cold calling for reputable B2B companies in North America.
We are growing rapidly and are looking for the right sales people to join our fun, dynamic and super competitive team.

Required & non negotiable:

At least 1 year B2B sales experience, either through closing or setting appointments (not B2C).
Pure cold calling experience (not warm calling or upselling).
A track record of meeting weekly or monthly targets.
Must possess a degree of work ethics with an ability to follow through.

We look forward to hearing from you!!
